name: Xiaomi Redmi K90 Pro Max
highlights:
Released 2025, October 23
218g, 7.9mm thickness
Android 16, HyperOS 3
512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front (Dragon Crystal Glass), aluminum frame
BODY: IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 68B colors, 2560Hz PWM, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR Vivid, HDR10+, 3500 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.7, 23mm (wide), 1/1.31", 1.2µm, dual pixel PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/3.0, 115mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, PDAF (30cm - ∞), OIS, 5x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.4, 18mm, 102˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.88", 0.61µm
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama

SOUND.Loudspeaker: Yes, with stereo speakers (with Dolby Atmos)
SOUND:
Tuned by Bose
Bose 2.1 stereo sound system with a woofer
24-bit/192kHz Hi-Res & Hi-Res wireless audio

COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC, GLONASS

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, proximity, gyro, compass

BATTERY.Charging:
100W wired, PD3.0, QC3+, 100W PPS
50W wireless
22.5W reverse wireless

MISC.Colors: Black, White, Denim Blue, Lamborgini White
